main.text:
Overview: SBTCVM's integrated help viewer.
controls:
scroll page: up/down keys or mouse wheel. You can click and drag non-link areas of the help viewer's window to scroll as well. scroll left/right: left/right keys change font size: -/+ keys Escape: quit F8: save screenshot in "CAP" directory. Pageup: jump up 20 lines. Pagedown: jump down 20 lines.
Links: Links are in blue. and they point to other help pages. Much like a link on the web, they are activated via clicking on them.
